eu_initiatives: Community Guidelines on State Aid to Maritime Transport. We support the idea of really implementing the objectives of the guidelines, in particular the need to sail under an EU flag. So far only 50% of the EU owned fleet sails under a member state flag.
organisation_name: EUROPEAN MAR II, LDA. & COMANDITA (ZONA FRANCA DA MADEIRA) (Euromar)
membership:
The shareholders of the company are: 
Dr. Albrecht Gundermann (ultimate beneficiary of the share held by Kyros Shipping GmbH & Co. KG) 
Jörg Molzahn 
Max Ammon
customers: S.D.M. - SOCIEDADE DE DESENVOLVIMENTO DA MADEIRA, S.A.
goals__remit: Vermarktung und teilweiser Betrieb des internationalen portugiesischen Schiffsregisters MAR mit Sitz auf Madeira. Beratung alles zuständigen portugiesischen Stellen in dieser Frage. Beratung von Reedereien, die unter der Flagge Portugals segeln.
